ns25:export-package.application-director-version: vFabric Application Director CLI BETA BUILD [5.0.0-814112]

application.name: BitNami Drupal
application.description: The BitNami Application Library for VMware is a collection of popular open source applications that are prepackaged and ready to use on your vFabric environment. It includes wikis, content and document management systems, portals, development tools, customer relationship management (CRM) systems and many other types of applications. You can learn more about them at http://bitnami.org/vfabric

ns10:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Fix the linux-firmware package export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y linux-firmware < /dev/console > /dev/console # Install MySQL package apt-get install -y mysql-server else yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install -x MySQL-server-community mysql-server fi

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns10:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# update mysql configuration to handle big packets sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ max_allowed_packet=1024M/g" $my_cnf_file # update listening port sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql restart else # set up auto-start on booting chkconfig mysqld on # restart mysqld service service mysqld start fi
# this will assign a password for mysql admin user 'root' mysqladmin -u $db_root_username password $db_root_password

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns10:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for changing the MySQL properties
ns10:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for MySql service to update db_port. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "MyAQL server UPDATE to update db_port"
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# stop the mysql service before updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql stop else service mysqld stop fi
# update listening port sed -ie "s/port=[0-9]*/port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
# start the mysql service after updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql start else service mysqld start fi
echo "Finished MySQL Server UPDATE"

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns10:component-version-script.script:
### BitNami Drupal Service INSTALL script ### #!/bin/bash
. $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
cd /tmp echo "Configuring BitNami Drupal.." echo "login: ${drupal_user}"
./bitnami-drupal* --mode unattended --prefix /opt/bitnami --base_user "${drupal_user}" --base_user_name "${drupal_user_name}" --base_mail "${drupal_mail}" --drupal_password "${drupal_password}" --base_password ${base_password} --baseinstalltype development --drupal_blog_name "${drupal_blog_name}" rm bitnami-drupal*
echo "OK!"

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns10:component-version-script.script:
### BitNami Drupal Service INSTALL script ### #!/bin/bash . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
ADAPTER_VERSION=1.0 APP_NAME=drupal APP_VERSION=7.15-0
if [ -x /usr/sbin/setenforce ]; then /usr/sbin/setenforce 0 fi
echo "Installing BitNami common packages.." yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install mod_ssl php53 php53-mysql php53-pdo php53-mbstring php53-xml php53-mbstring php53-xml php53-gd libmcrypt php53-mcrypt
echo "Downloading BitNami packages.." platform=`uname -m`
cd /tmp
if [ $platform == "i686" ]; then echo "32 bit" wget ${download_url}/bitnami-nativeadapter-$ADAPTER_VERSION-linux-installer.run wget ${download_url}/bitnami-$APP_NAME-$APP_VERSION-module-linux-installer.run else echo "64 bit" wget ${download_url}/bitnami-nativeadapter-$ADAPTER_VERSION-linux-x64-installer.run wget ${download_url}/bitnami-$APP_NAME-$APP_VERSION-0-module-linux-x64-installer.run fi
echo "Installing BitNami packages.." chmod 755 bitnami-* ./bitnami-native* --mode unattended --prefix /opt/bitnami --mysql_hostname ${mysql_hostname} --mysql_port ${mysql_port} rm bitnami-native*
mv /etc/httpd/conf.d/welcome.conf /etc/httpd/conf.d/welcome.conf.bak mv /var/www/html /var/www/html.orig ln -s /opt/bitnami/apache2/htdocs /var/www/html
echo "OK!"

service-version.description: Apache 2.2 The Apache HTTP Server is an open-source HTTP server for modern operating systems including UNIX, Microsoft Windows, Mac OS/X and Netware. The goal of this project is to provide a secure, efficient and extensible server that provides HTTP services observing the current HTTP standards. Apache has been the most popular web server on the Internet since April of 1996.

ns10:component-version-script.description: Configure repo and install Apache server
ns10:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install httpd
# Ports on which to listen sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
# set up auto-start on booting chkconfig httpd on

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns10:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
# Copy the default index page into place cp /var/www/error/noindex.html /var/www/html/index.html fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

ns10:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Start Apache server UPDATE on http_port, http_proxy_port, and/or http_node_port."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Remove all the settings and set up with the new properits values. CONF_FILE="/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf" LINE_NUM=`grep -n "^<VirtualHost .*" ${CONF_FILE} | sed -n 's/^\([0-9]*\)[:].*/\1/p' | sed -n '1p'` if [ ! ${LINE_NUM} == "" ]; then sed -ie "${LINE_NUM},\$"'d' ${CONF_FILE} fi
# Start re-configuration if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${appsrv_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="" STICKY_SESSION_NAME="JSESSIONID|jsessionid" if [ "$autogen_sticky_cookie" == "YES" ]; then STICKY_SESSION_NAME="ROUTEID" COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE="Header add Set-Cookie \"ROUTEID=.%{BALANCER_WORKER_ROUTE}e; path=/\" env=BALANCER_ROUTE_CHANGED" fi
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=$STICKY_SESSION_NAME nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On $COOKIE_HEADER_DIRECTIVE </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi
# restart httpd service service httpd restart
echo "Finished Apache server UPDATE"

meta-tag-type.name: OS Family
meta-tag-type.description: Operating System (OS) Family.

bindable-props.name: ClusterSize
bindable-props.description: Number of nodes in the cluster
